item.title: Electrum
item.description: Topic: Electrum Wallet 4 Location: Stephan Livera Podcast Electrum GitHub: https://github.com/spesmilo/electrum Transcript completed by: Stephan Livera Edited by: Michael Folkson Intro Stephan Livera (SL): Thomas and Ghost43. Welcome back to the show. Thomas Voegtlin (TV): Hi, thank you. Ghost43 (G43): Hey Stephan, Thanks for having me. SL: Thomas, my listeners have already heard you on a prior episode. Ghost, did you want to tell us about yourself, how you got into Bitcoin and how you got into developing with Electrum Wallet?
